title: Add app name “BRUTAL” to the sign-in page

requirements.text: Update the sign-in page to display the app name text "BRUTAL" in a prominent, on-brand way (e.g., as a heading near the existing logo/title), without altering or re-laying out any other existing sign-in page content beyond what is necessary to insert the name.

quotes: can we add the app name on the sign in page? Evertyhing else is fine, do not mess other thing on the sing up page just add the name

acceptanceCriteria: The sign-in page visibly shows the app name "BRUTAL" as text (not only as image alt text).

All existing sign-in page sections (logo area, headline/tagline, continue button, feature cards, footer) remain present and functionally unchanged aside from the minimal spacing needed to add the app name.
No changes are made to onboarding/sign-up flow pages or their UI.

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui (compose existing UI components only).
Do not modify any onboarding/sign-up page content; only add the app name to the sign-in page.
nonGoals: Redesigning the sign-in page layout or changing existing copy besides inserting the app name
